answer:
QUESTION
1. i was cleaning my penis(not by stroking it)well i was shaving the hair off and clean it(not by hand,water and tissue wrapped around hand) is this wrong? 2. when i was 12/13 i had these white bits on my penis and it smelled so i had to clean it by hand etc....is this also wrong? ifso shall i repent? 3. are any of the 2 are masturbations?
ANSWER


Share:
At the outset, we wish to point out that the hair on the penis does not have
to be removed. Only the pubic hair which is just above the private parts
below the navel has to be removed. One may wash the private parts directly
with the hands. There is no need to wrap tissue around the hand.

Since you are in your youth, and you are sensitive to the point that
touching the private parts may lead to erection, etc. you should minimise
that as much as you can. In any case, the two enquired situations are not
masturbations.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
